entities.entity:
<GROUND_RULES>
- Use ONLY the information explicitly present in the provided CONTEXT blocks.
- Output MUST be valid JSON only.
- Never output "N/A"; use null.
- Do NOT invent beneficiaries.
</GROUND_RULES>

<TARGET_HHID>
{{target_hhid}}
</TARGET_HHID>

<ACCOUNTS_WITH_OWNERS_CONTEXT>
{{accounts_with_owners}}
</ACCOUNTS_WITH_OWNERS_CONTEXT>

<BENEFICIARIES_HHID_CONTEXT>
{{beneficiaries_hhid}}
</BENEFICIARIES_HHID_CONTEXT>

<IRA_RULE>
Treat an account as IRA-type if registration_type contains the substring "IRA" (case-insensitive).
If NOT IRA-type, beneficiaries must be an empty array [].
If IRA-type, beneficiaries must include all beneficiary rows where:
- Household ID == TARGET_HHID
- Account Number == the account id key (string/number match allowed)
</IRA_RULE>

<TASK>
For each account in ACCOUNTS_WITH_OWNERS_CONTEXT, add:
- beneficiaries: [ ...matching beneficiary row objects... ]
Return the updated JSON object keyed by account id.
</TASK>

<OUTPUT_JSON_ONLY>
{
  "18986024": {
    "registration_type": "...",
    "primary_source_name": "...",
    "secondary_source_name": null,
    "primary": { ... } ,
    "secondary": null,
    "beneficiaries": [ { ...full beneficiary row... }, ... ]
  },
  ...
}
</OUTPUT_JSON_ONLY>
